column4: hye guys... i have a problem.. i want to install a software on my hardy. i use add/remove under application menu.. but when during the download the software, system tell me to insert the disk labels Ubuntu7.10 Gutsy Gibbon... why???

in terminal gksu gedit /etc/apt/sources.list. then comment out the line for the cd with a #. should be at the top of the file.
